title: The Truth
description: My family has given everything to salvage the Zoric name and reputation from my father's tarnished legacy.I only needed a moment to destroy it all.Along with two hearts.It was supposed to be a simple charade. I never thought Ford and I would fall in love.But I can't take back what I've done.He can't change the past.And what we've done changes everything.But only if I stop running.Someone has to lose either way. But when the truth comes out, it might just be all of us.
author: Stella Gray
